# The `VariableDbgInfo` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

Description of the location of a variable whose Address is valid and unchanging during function execution.

The Address may be:
<ul>
<li>A stack index, which can be negative for fixed stack objects.</li>
<li>A <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcregister">MCRegister</a>, whose entry value contains the address of the variable.</li>
</ul>

Definition at line 427 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinefunction-h">MachineFunction.h</a>.
